job.title: Sr/Lead Software Engineer - Python, NLP, ML (REMOTE)
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: If you are a SrLead Software Engineer coming from a strong Python  NLPML background looking for full remote please read onbrbrLocated in San Mateo California  we are a VCfunded company disrupting a 15B market and using AI to mine unstructured data Our founders include some of the top Big Data startup veterans with excellent track recordsbrbrThese all will be full time offering base pay  generous equity  full benefits  full remotebrbrWhat You Will Be Doingbrulli We are looking for a Sr Software Engineer itching to solve large real world problems by applying NLPML techniques on unstructured Enterprise data  eg emails call transcripts and documentslili You will be responsible for design and development of enterprise grade features and microservices involving information retrieval text mining classifier models and recommender systemslili The role also requires proficient understanding of computer programming fundamentals and solid knowledge of Python and structural programming languages such as Javalili Our application is designed to run both onprem and SaaS hence understanding of docker based microservices is requiredbrliulWhat You Need for this Positionbrulli 7 years experience in software development of which 4 years are in Python Flask or Django Restful Frameworks information retrieval processing with Pandas and NLP frameworksincluding but not limited to Stanford Core NLP NLTK and Scikitlearnlili Experience implementing modern ML classifier models and recommender systems eg Bayesian Adaptive Methodlili Proficiency in development stacks including SQL and NoSQL JSON formats Restful Serviceslili Comfortable running Docker containers for sandbox development and during code integrationlili Experience with Linux Java Spring Elastic Search Postgres Cassandra and AWS EC2 systems is an added plusbrliulWhats In It for Youbrulli Competitive base paylili Equitylili Full benefits packagelili HUGE room for career growthbrliulSo if you are a SrLead Software Engineer looking for a challenge please apply todaybrbrstronguEmail Your Resume In Word TobrbrustrongLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you Clicking apply is the best way to apply but you may alsobrbrBobbyJuneOptellocombrulliPlease do NOT change the email subject line in any way You must keep the JobID linkedin  BJ11639072  in the email subject line for your application to be consideredbrliulBobby June  Recruiting Manager  OptellobrbrApplicants must be authorized to work in the USbrbrstrongOptello is proud to be an Equal Opportunity EmployerbrbrstrongAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex national origin disability protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by lawbrbrstrongYour Right to Workstrong  In compliance with federal law all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire
